list.name: Default
list.comment: Add of components and command lines to create a surya package downloadable from a private index on S3

task.summary: Default task
Add DrEA_head package for factoring code. Especially for functions and global variables used along sources.
Add DrEA_head package for factoring code. Especially for functions and global variables used along sources.
Creation of class paper as article's texts and metadata. Function read_paper for initiate a paper object from parsed json.

"/Users/redhouaneabdellaoui/anaconda/envs/DrEA" the efficient env with the right spacy version build from source. We have to select the right interpreter to import spacy and use pytextrank. For the pytextrank work we need to use Test data from "/Tests/pytextrank_dat".
Add the o1.json file generated by a pytextrank test. Need to be delete when the pytextrank job will be complete.
Resolved previous envs problems. The choose of the right interpreter, uninstall and re install spacy. Install models. The pytextrank exemple run correctly.
Integration of tests_translation.py in Tests directory. Place tests_pytextrank in Tests folder. Add a Buffer directory for interactions between data and pytextrank.
Remove useless file graph.dot generated by pytextrank first tests.
Minors modifications. Exclusively tests to understand the pytextrank workflow.
Add of PyTeaser python 3 compatible version test. The use of python 3 compatible version needed to be build from source. See repository : https://github.com/alanbuxton/PyTeaserPython3
Summary synthesized from a String containing the text to summarize and from another String containing the document title.
Summary of our own article available. Enrichment of paper class with a _get_paper_text method for extracting article's text to summarize.
Upgrade project's structure for better work space quality. Reorganization (part 1) test directory and setup.py.
Upgrade project's structure for better work space quality. Reorganization (part 2) test directory and setup.py. The test's repository is clean.
Add of unit tests.
Add verbosity to unit tests.
PEP-8 regularization.
Add of sumy python summarization tool experimentation.
Rewrite the Readme.md
Readme.md corrections
WIP - Replace PyTeaser summerization by LSA summarization from sumy package.
Fix the API call, replace "pyteaser" by "sumy" and add of logging
Logging into surya.log file
Refacto of surya code. Renaming function and generate summary from parsed dictionaries, not even from json files.
Refacto of project's structure
Prepare a test for summary generation
logging the SP AI call's exception and work on case of connexion failure
WIP - Implement getters for the paper class. Until the get_section_text method
Add section's texts getters. As list of st instances and as str concatenating section's contents
WIP - Summarizing a selected part from the paper
Minor corrections
Division of the drealib package on two modules.
Rename the drealib package to surya
Add of a parsing function for multi articles input
Code corrections
Add of Summarize list of papers with sections selection
Add of unit tests
minor corrections
Minor corrections
Add of a method for getting sections names from a paper. A text_cleaner module was also added.
Minor corrections in project's documentation.
WIP - Refacto of advenced test to summerizer tests
Add a connection to spv by using a session object and enrich the Makefile for setting up and shutting down the spv docker container
Result of an experimentation of the GROBID parser
WIP - cleaning texts from footers WIP
Setup of pipenv for dependency management
Minor Refacto
Add of a count for papers per year and a class test for the charts data extraction
Add of components and command lines to create a surya package downloadable from a private index on S3

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Add of components and command lines to create a surya package downloadable from a private index on S3

expression.expression-string: 'Data were collected using a Web crawler designed by Kappa Santé as part of the Detec’t project to analyze social media for drug safety. Several meta-analyses showed that current methods of improving medication adherence for chronic diseases were mostly complex and not very effective [2,3]. Stellefson et al [12] reviewed Web 2.0 interventions proposing a program of self-management to patients older than 50 years for their chronic disease. For example, Topaz et al [16] mined clinical narratives to identify heart failure patients who did not comply with their treatment. Topics 9, 10, and 12 focused on messages about AEs experienced or feared by users, along with the drug’s effects overall. Eighteen posts were assigned erroneously to the treatment cessation topic because they contained terms like stop, although not reporting discontinuation of aripiprazole. These included 11 messages (5.4%, 11/203), where interruption was not related to any health topic such as in “[...] I’m stopped, ...'
